column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Mike - Thanks for your review
column2: and we appreciate your kind words. The founder and CEO of JINYA Ramen Bar is named Tomonori Takahashi. He owns several restaurants in Ebisu
column4: and brought the JINYA concept to Los Angeles several years ago. He has since franchised JINYA to numerous cities across the country. We were the third franchisee to sign up.
